title: ASHE: the way of life
creator_contributor_role: Academy of Sport Health and Education (ASHE), partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: ASHE - a new beginning for Colin
description: After the death of his mother and losing his way to a life of crime, Colin, a sports loving Shepparton boy, was offered a new beginning - a lifeline - through ASHE (Academy of Health Sports and Education).
